entry.title: WIND WARNING , Bella Bella
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:01 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bella Bella Airport 09:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: 7.8°C
Pressure: 98.7 kPa
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 6.9°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Rain ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 90 gusting to 110 this morning then south 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Periods of rain over southern sections before morning. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming north 20 after midnight except northeast 50 gusting to 70 near mainland valleys and inlets overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Overcast. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Overcast. Periods of rain over southern sections. Wind north 20 km/h except northeast 50 gusting to 70 near mainland valleys and inlets. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
